name: @andrewt03/eslint-typescript-rules
description: Recommended ESLint Rules for general TypeScript, Node.js/Express.js, Angular, and React.js Projects
author: Andrew Tran

scripts.precheck: npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.version:patch: npm run precheck && npm version patch && npm install && npm run publish
scripts.version:minor: npm run precheck && npm version minor && npm install && npm run publish
scripts.version:major: npm run precheck && npm version major && npm install && npm run publish
